en.title: Career Achievements
en.description: The following is a summary of some competitions and achievements from my past four years in university:

zh.title: 生活中的成就
zh.description: 過去大學四年的一些比賽經歷和成就，彙總於下：

en.title: Scholarship for Outstanding Achievement, Alumni Association of the Department of Arabic

zh.title: 阿拉伯文系友會成績優異獎學金
zh.description: 在學業成績上的優異表現受到認可。

en.title: Arabic Language Scholarship, Arab Cultural and Economic Association

zh.title: 中阿文經獎學金
zh.description: 在學業成績上的優異表現受到認可。

en.title: Presenter at the Oxford Postgraduate Conference
en.description: Presented original research on Arabic geminate consonants at the 2025 Oxford Postgraduate Conference in Linguistics, focusing on acoustic patterns and production challenges for Mandarin speakers.

zh.title: 牛津研究生會議發表者
zh.description: 於2025年牛津語言學研究生會議發表阿拉伯語重音輔音之原創研究，探討其聲學特徵及華語母語者在發音上的挑戰。

en.title: INTEL DevCup
en.description: Participated in the 2022 Intel AI DevCup competition with the theme "Non-Invasive AI Detection System for Multiple Types of Cancer," successfully reaching the finals among over one hundred teams.

zh.title: INTEL DevCup
zh.description: 以「多類別癌症之非侵入式AI偵測系統」為主題，參與2022 INTEL舉辦之AI DevCup競賽，從一百多組隊伍中成功進入決賽。

en.title: Zhongji Society AI Competition
en.description: Participated in the 2022 AI Innovation Competition organized by the Zhongji Society with the theme "Self-Supervised Learning Model for Detecting Colorectal Polyp Structural Information," and successfully received an Honorable Mention award.

zh.title: 中技社 AI競賽
zh.description: 以「自監督式學習模型偵測大腸息肉結構資訊」為主題，參與2022 中技社舉辦之AI創意競賽，成功獲得入選獎。

en.title: Prudential Life Insurance Business Innovation Competition
en.description: Submitted a proposal for a psychological counseling service named "Love You More and More," participating in the 2023 Prudential Life Insurance Business Innovation Competition, and successfully reached the finals.

zh.title: 保誠人壽商業創意競賽
zh.description: 以「樂來樂愛你」為名的心理諮商服務為提案，參與2023 保誠人壽舉辦之商業創意競賽，最終成功進入決賽。

en.title: Fundamentals of Deep Learning Certificate – NVIDIA DLI
en.description: Awarded to CHIH-HAN LIN by NVIDIA Deep Learning Institute for successfully completing the 'Fundamentals of Deep Learning' course and demonstrating foundational deep learning skills.

zh.title: 深度學習基礎課程證書（NVIDIA DLI）
zh.description: 由 NVIDIA 深度學習學院（DLI）頒發，林致涵完成《Fundamentals of Deep Learning》課程並展現深度學習的基礎能力。
